quote: When you're posting on social media and having those static posts, you're actually not really leveling up people's understanding of who you are.
why_clipworthy: It challenges the conventional approach to social media marketing.
suggested_hook: Are your social media posts truly showcasing who you are?

quote: Everyone hates their own voice... We are all our own worst judges.
why_clipworthy: Addresses a common fear with a relatable personal story.
suggested_hook: Do you hate the sound of your own voice? You're not alone.
